column4: メリッサ＿ちょっとした驚き

どうしたの？
そんなに慌てて？
column5:
What's wrong?
Why are you in such a rush?
column11:
What's wrong?
Why are you up such a rush?

column4: ガロイ親方＿戦闘中真剣

鉄道会社からの依頼だ。
岩石で線路がふさがれている。
column5: We've had a request from the Railway Operators. The track's gotten blocked by some rocks.
column11:
We've had a request from the Railway Operators.
The track's become blocked by some rocks.

column4:
鉱石輸送中の事故が
原因らしい。
column5: Looks like it was caused by an accident while they were transporting some ore.
column11: Looks like it was caused by an accident whilst they were transporting some ore.

column4:
このままでは大惨事になる。
すぐに岩をどけるぞ。
column5:
This could be a disaster!
We've got to move the rocks out of the way ASAP.
column11:
It's a disaster.
We need to move the rocks out of the way as soon as possible.

column4:
一刻の猶予もない。
急げ！
column5:
There's not a second to lose!
HURRY UP!
column11:
There's not a moment to lose!
Hurry up!

column4:
依頼を確認しとくよ。時間内に
/c5すべての岩を線路外へ撤去/c3する
んだ。
column5: To confirm: You need to /c5remove all of the rocks that are blocking the railroad/c3 within the time limit.
column11: To confirm, you need to /c5remove all of the rocks that are blocking the railroad/c3, within the time limit.

column4: ただし、駅は壊さないようにね。
column5: Just make sure you don't accidentally destroy the station in the process.
column11: Just, make sure you don't accidentally destroy the station in the progress.
All righty, time to get started.
